import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' const {REACT_APP_GET_ALL_COUNTRIES} = process.env const CreatActivity = () => { const [countries, setCountries] = useState([]) useEffect(() =>{ async function fetchData(){ try { const response = await axios.get(REACT_APP_GET_ALL_COUNTRIES) const data = response.data setCountries({ name : data.name }) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } fetchData() },[]) return (

Create Activity

) } export default CreatActivity
